main.bio: 'Hello World'. You have  caught this guy   in the midst of his career journey as he takes on the world  taking with him his skills as a full stack web developer and the knowledge he acquired throughout his years  working in business and marketing . In his most recent adventure he wrapped up a 7 year project as a customer success engineer for  a V.C. startup that helped contribute to the success of almost a dozen companies before  closing up shop . He is is very happy been able to take part in the . Prior to that he was seen working for Open Water  contributing to the  development of code bases for the various startups the company was backing . Over the past he has been given the oppurtunity to code for some amazing companies and startups utlimately finding his niche  coding in Javascript and its framework libaries. He has built everything from  custom API's with node , mobile apps with React Native, and  websites like this one using React. When he wasnt coding on his journey, he was busy performing a variety of roles in sales and marketing . His notes show that he has accumulated over a decades worth of experience within the retail sales and marketing world doing everything from direct sales to store operations to regional management.  Fast forward to today ,  he now finds himself looking for a new path and is currently looking to find a role that allows him to utilize everything he has to offer with both tech and business expertise .
